article:
What do you do after school? You may say you go  home  and do  _  homework. But I think we can have  many  other things to do after class.
We can  _  different clubs, like the art club and the music club. What can you do? If you swim well, you can be in the  _  club. Maybe  you can't play the violin  _  the guitar well, but you can  _  to play them at the music club.  _  some people there can help you and you can   _  friends. I like books and I often go to the  _  club. I can talk with other people, so I am very happy every day. Do you like books? Come to join us.
